recent

  • weekly picks (Feb 3 week 2022)
  • A WordCloud of 2022 Feb 3rd week collection

    1. http://arxiv.org/abs/2202.06244 Pressure-induced superconductivity reentrant in transition metal dichalcogenide TiSe2 (TiSe2, arXiv.org)

    2. http://arxiv.org/abs/2202.05850 Fragmented Cooper pair condensation in striped superconductors (fragmented Cooper pair, arXiv.org)

    3. http://arxiv.org/abs/2202.06528 Photoinduced 120-degree spin order in the Kondo-lattice model on a triangular lattice (Kondo lattice, arXiv.org)

    4. http://arxiv.org/abs/2202.06184 Breakdown of bulk-projected isotropy in surface electronic states of topological Kondo insulator SmB$_6$(001) (SmB6, arXiv.org)

    5. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevX.12.011029 Observation of a Novel Lattice Instability in Ultrafast Photoexcited SnSe (lattice instability, PRX)

    6. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.075306 Dynamic Friedel oscillations on the surface of a topological insulator (Friedel, PRB)

    7. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.075414 Theoretical realization of two-dimensional half-metallicity and fully spin-polarized multiple nodal-line fermions in monolayer PrOBr (PRB)

    8. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.085121 Charge dynamics in magnetically disordered Mott insulators (PRB)

    9. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.L081107 Experimental realization of topological corner states in long-range-coupled electrical circuits (PRB)

    10. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.L081408 Strain-tuning of domain walls in multilayer graphene probed in the quantum Hall regime (PRB)

    11. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.05588v1 Large family candidates for kagome topological superconductors (kagome, arxiv.org)

    12. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.05561v1 Spin-triplet superconductivity in Weyl nodal-line semimetals (arxiv.org)

    13. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.05663v1 Valley-Polarized State Induced $\varphi_0$-Josephson Junction in Twisted Bilayer Graphene (arxiv.org)

    14. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.05660v1 Spin stiffness, spectral weight, and Landau damping of magnons in metallic spiral magnets (arxiv.org)

    15. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.05368v1 Uniaxial stress effect on the quasi-one-dimensional Kondo lattice CeCo$_2$Ga$_8$ (1D Ce, arxiv.org)

    16. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.05379v1 Theory of perturbatively nonlinear quantum transport I: general formulation and structure of the retarded correlator (AManchon, arxiv.org)

    17. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.05378v1 Theory of perturbatively nonlinear quantum transport II: Hilbert space truncation, gauge invariance, and second order transport in a spatially uniform, time-varying electric field (AManchon, arxiv.org)
